RUIN is a thrash metal band from Portland, ME. RUIN was formed in 2005. RUIN's latest album Rite of Passage debuted in October 2014.


== Members ==


=== Current line up ===
Richard Carey – guitar and vocals
Craig Carey – drums
Kevin Whitman – guitar
Todd Biddwell – bass


=== Former members ===
Ken Vought – former guitarist (2005–2012)


== Discography ==
Hands of Enmity (2007)
Human Moral Deception (2009)
Rite of Passage (2014)
